segment.source: description: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.
segment.target: description: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.

segment.source: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.
segment.target: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.

segment.source: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: title: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising
segment.target: title: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising

segment.source: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising
segment.target: Add ads to apps with Microsoft Advertising

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.
segment.target: Make more money from your Windows apps by including video and banner ads from Microsoft Advertising.

segment.source: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.
segment.target: The ads show in Windows apps for PCs, tablets, and phones.

segment.source: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: You can monitor your ad performance in real time by using the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: To include ads from Microsoft Advertising in your apps, use the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.
segment.target: To include ads from Microsoft Advertising in your apps, use the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.

segment.source: Use the following resources to get started.
segment.target: Use the following resources to get started.

segment.source: Resource
segment.target: Resource

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Monetize your app with ads
segment.target: Monetize your app with ads

segment.source: Learn more about the different ways to monetize your apps with ads, and get started with the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.
segment.target: Learn more about the different ways to monetize your apps with ads, and get started with the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.

segment.source: Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK
segment.target: Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK

segment.source: Learn about using the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK to show ads in apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.
segment.target: Learn about using the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK to show ads in apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.

segment.source: Advertising performance report
segment.target: Advertising performance report

segment.source: After you integrate ads into your app, refer to this report to track how they are performing.
segment.target: After you integrate ads into your app, refer to this report to track how they are performing.

segment.source: In addition to showing ads from Microsoft Advertising, you can also use ad mediation to optimize your advertising revenue by mediating ad requests from multiple ad networks.
segment.target: In addition to showing ads from Microsoft Advertising, you can also use ad mediation to optimize your advertising revenue by mediating ad requests from multiple ad networks.

segment.source: For more information, see Use ad mediation to maximize ad revenue.
segment.target: For more information, see Use ad mediation to maximize ad revenue.

segment.source: For more information about the developer differences between ad mediation and displaying banner ads exclusively from Microsoft Advertising, see What is the difference: AdMediator or AdControl.
segment.target: For more information about the developer differences between ad mediation and displaying banner ads exclusively from Microsoft Advertising, see What is the difference: AdMediator or AdControl.
